1.

```{r}
set.seed(33)

mu <- 5
sigma <- 2
n <- 30

x <- rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma)
print(x)

```


2.

```{r}
boot_mean <- function(x, B) {
  n <- length(x)
  bootstrap_means <- numeric(B)  
  
  for (b in 1:B) {
    x_star <- sample(x, size = n, replace = TRUE)
    bootstrap_means[b] <- mean(x_star)
  }
  
  return(bootstrap_means)
}

```



3.

```{r}
B <- 500
bootstrap_means <- boot_mean(x, B)

head(bootstrap_means)

```

4.

```{r}
lower <- quantile(bootstrap_means, 0.025)
upper <- quantile(bootstrap_means, 0.975)

cat("95% bootstrap percentile CI for mu: [", lower, ",", upper, "]")

```

```{r}
hist(bootstrap_means, breaks = 30, main="Bootstrap Distribution of Mean",
     xlab="Bootstrap Means", col="lightblue")
abline(v=c(lower, upper), col="red", lwd=2, lty=2)  # CI bounds
abline(v=mean(x), col="blue", lwd=2)  # original sample mean

```
